mapper.select: select id, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, adver_type, adver_url, adver_content, adver_link, start, end, is_show from video_advertising where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into video_advertising(created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, adver_type, adver_url, adver_content, adver_link, start, end, is_show) values (#{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedAt}, #{updatedBy}, #{deletedAt}, #{sort}, #{stable}, #{status}, #{memo}, #{adverType}, #{adverUrl}, #{adverContent}, #{adverLink}, #{start}, #{end}, #{isShow})

insert into video_advertising(created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, adver_type, adver_url, adver_content, adver_link, start, end,is_show) values
(#{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedAt}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.deletedAt}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.stable}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.memo}, #{entity.adverType}, #{entity.adverUrl}, #{entity.adverContent}, #{entity.adverLink}, #{entity.start}, #{entity.end},#{entity.isShow})

insert into video_advertising(created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, deleted_at, sort, stable, status, memo, adver_type, adver_url, adver_content, adver_link, start, end) values
(#{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedAt}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.deletedAt}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.stable}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.memo}, #{entity.adverType}, #{entity.adverUrl}, #{entity.adverContent}, #{entity.adverLink}, #{entity.start}, #{entity.end})
on duplicate key update created_at = values(created_at), created_by = values(created_by), updated_at = values(updated_at), updated_by = values(updated_by), deleted_at = values(deleted_at), sort = values(sort), stable = values(stable), status = values(status), memo = values(memo), adver_type = values(adver_type), adver_url = values(adver_url), adver_content = values(adver_content), adver_link = values(adver_link), start = values(start), end = values(end)
mapper.update:
update video_advertising
created_at = #{createdAt},
created_by = #{createdBy},
updated_at = #{updatedAt},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
deleted_at = #{deletedAt},
sort = #{sort},
stable = #{stable},
status = #{status},
memo = #{memo},
adver_type = #{adverType},
adver_url = #{adverUrl},
adver_content = #{adverContent},
adver_link = #{adverLink},
start = #{start},
end = #{end},
is_show = #{isShow},
where id = #{id}
